Tutorial.Title: Tutorial 1

TutorialStep.Instructions: This example shows how to initialize breeze and create and run a very simple query. Just press run...

So let's make the query a bit more complicated by adding an "orderBy" clause.

Simply replace this query

var query = new entityModel.EntityQuery() .from("Todos") with this query var query = new entityModel.EntityQuery() .from("Todos") .orderBy("CreatedAt");

To run your updated application, click Run in the bottom-left pane, or press Ctrl+Enter. The result? Your UI should display the person's name. OK, this is just Hello World - we'll move on to more exciting things shortly.

If everything is working fine, click Continue below.

Having trouble? If at any time you find it unclear how to proceed, and your code isn't behaving as the tutorial describes, you can always click the "Help, it's not working!" button (below). This will replace your code with a working copy.
